mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tComment (fkUserSeq, fkBoardSeq, sContent) VALUES (${fkUserSeq}, ${fkBoardSeq}, #{sContent})
mapper.select: SELECT cmt.*, member.sName AS username FROM tComment cmt INNER JOIN tUser member ON cmt.fkUserSeq = member.nUserSeq WHERE cmt.fkBoardSeq = ${fkBoardSeq} AND nReply = 0 ORDER BY cmt.dtCreateDate DESC LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${rowCnt}

mapper.update: UPDATE tBoard SET nCommentCount = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tComment WHERE fkBoardSeq = ${fkBoardSeq} AND nReply = 0 ) WHERE nBoardSeq = ${fkBoardSeq}
